messages.title: Stop Brexit
messages.content: Stop Brexit and invest the £50 billion Remain Bonus in public services and tackling inequality

messages.title: A Deal Is Just The Start
messages.content: Any Brexit deal will mean years more negotiations over trade with the EU. The Conservative deal is not the end of Brexit - just the start of the process.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Stop Brexit and invest the £50 billion Remain Bonus in public services and tackling inequality
Tackle the climate emergency by generating 80% of our electricity from renewables by 2030 and insulating all low-income homes by 2025

keyPolicies.policyTitle: Give every child the best start in life
keyPolicies.policyDescription: Give every child the best start in life by recruiting 20,000 more teachers as part of an extra £10 billion a year for schools
Build a fairer economy by providing free childcare from nine months and giving every adult £10,000 to spend on skills and training throughout their lives
Transform our mental health services by treating mental health with the same urgency as physical health

mentions.tacticalSituation: The Liberal Democrats beat Labour and the Conservatives in Croydon South when you last voted, in May’s European Elections.

issues.brexitEurope: Brexit is the biggest threat facing us today. If you choose me as your MP, I promise to vote to cancel Brexit completely.

community.content: Although we need more homes, new developments must be in keeping with the area and we need to build family houses, with gardens and not just flats.

leaflet.personalStatement: Anna understands the devastating impact Brexit is already having on the economy and our local businesses. Having been on Epsom’s Planning Committee for eight years Anna has a deep knowledge of how planning works and how to make sure over-development is prevented.

politicalExperience.achievements: Anna has a deep knowledge of how planning works and how to make sure over-development is prevented.

examples: Tackle the climate emergency by generating 80% of our electricity from renewables by 2030
Invest the £50 billion Remain Bonus in public services
Brexit is the biggest threat facing us today
The Conservative deal is not the end of Brexit - just the start of the process.
new developments must be in keeping with the area and we need to build family houses, with gardens and not just flats.

personalStories.story: Anna understands the devastating impact Brexit is already having on the economy and our local businesses.

examples: Many of you have contacted me complaining that the Labour Council don’t listen to local people on planning matters.
Any Brexit deal will mean years more negotiations over trade with the EU. The Conservative deal is not the end of Brexit - just the start of the process.
While Labour and the Conservatives argue over different forms of Brexit, the Liberal Democrats believe any form of Brexit will damage our country.

nonPolicyAttributes.localness: Anna moved to the area in 2013
nonPolicyAttributes.employment: She has worked as an HR Director for many years and is now back at university studying Business Psychology.
nonPolicyAttributes.family: Her daughter attended The Hayes and Riddlesdown Collegiate.

examples: Anna moved to the area in 2013.
